GABRIEL ON VERGE OF ARSENAL MOVE

Lille defender Gabriel Magalhaes is expected to finally agree a deal to move to Arsenal today.

The Brazilian centre back has been the subject of a long and drawn out saga with a number of clubs feeling that they had been able to acquire his services along the way.

Manchester United held discussions with representatives of the 22 year old along with a tentative interest from PSG, however neither made an official bid.

Magalhaes has always favoured a move to the Premier League and even had a medical at Everton’s Finch Farm training ground back in March before the coronavirus pandemic suspended football Napoli made the player a ‘big salary’ offer in a last ditch attempt to beat Arsenal to his signature but after months of indecision the promising central defender has chosen the Gunners as his next career move.

Gabriel was at Lille’s opening game of the season last night, a 1-1 draw with Rennes, but is expected in London over the next 48 hours for a medical.
